amendment.description: To provide funding for 3,000 unites of permanent supportive housing for homeless, disabled, and elderly persons in the State of Louisiana, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2795 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2795 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S11375-11377; text: CR S11376) To provide funding for 3,000 unites of permanent supportive housing for homeless, disabled, and elderly persons in the State of Louisiana, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2795 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
